column1: '''Stephen Stanton''' is a versatile voice actor and voicematcher. He voiced [[Sauron]] and [[Uruk-hai]] in several [[:Category:Games
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'' - [[Sauron]], Uruk-hai
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'' - Uruk-hai
* [[2003]]: [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (video game)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (video game)]] - Uruk-hai warriors
